title: What is the difference between zone of proximal development and scaffolding? - Quora

response.answer_text: We must remember that Vygotsky never used this term when writing. It was introduced by Wood et al. (1976). Once the student, with the benefit of scaffolding, masters the task, the scaffolding can then be removed and the student will then be able to complete the task again on his own. So pretty much scaffolding is the support in the learning of the required task. If you found my answer helpful, take a look at www.scaffoldingjhb.co.za thats how I found your question by looking for scaffolding.
